titles.title: Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide commuter flexible spending arrangements.
Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain employer-provided transportation benefits (i.e., commuting and parking costs, transit passes) under tax-qualified flexible spending arrangements.
